__e: HAVEN'T YOU ALWAYS SAID CAESAR'S CAUSE IS WRONG?
Caesar is away, and I am here alone.
Caesar is our dearest friend, but what he is doing is... I do not know.
If Caesar has an affliction, he has it and suffers, whether you know it or not.
Did you not hear Caesar say?
At one point, Caesar asked of each of us what manner of death we would choose.
But you know Caesar and you know how I think.
What for ? You can't even drive it !
Caesar and the dream that was murdered with him.
I have been in pain, Cesare, for all my years.
All I have left now is Cesare. At least he's here.
My, how beautiful you are. I love my husband, Cesare, however difficult it has been.
And still, Caesar has no son, no child at all.
You have to keep playing the chief, eh, Cæsar?
If you mean caesar, he's not my man anymore.
Hmm. Unfortunately, this is one of those trips where I have to render unto Caesar what is Caesar's.
What's the harm in giving credit where credit is due?
Give Caesar what is due Caesar, give God what is due God.
Hmm. Unfortunately, this is one of those trips where I have to render unto Caesar what is Caesar's.
